Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.Board

Class Slot

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Board.Slot
public class Slot
extends java.lang.Object
Contains an ArrayList of Arrays with all the DevCard in possessions by the Player.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Slot()
    Instantiates the ArrayList with the 3 empty lots: every one of the 3 slots is an array of 3 DevCard

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    boolean checkSpace​(DevCard card, int slot)
    Check if the DevCard it wants to add can be add in the chosen slot according to the Slot's rules.
    java.util.ArrayList<DevCard> getAllCards()
    Get an ArrayList with all the DevCard in possession by the Player (even if not usable to produce).
    DevCard[] getFrontCards()
    Get an array with the DevCard on the top of every slot: the only usable to produce.
    void placeCard​(DevCard card, int slot)
    Receive a DevCard and add it in the first empty space in the slot chosen by the Player.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • Slot

      public Slot()
      Instantiates the ArrayList with the 3 empty lots: every one of the 3 slots is an array of 3 DevCard

  • Method Details

    • placeCard

      public void placeCard​(DevCard card, int slot)
      Receive a DevCard and add it in the first empty space in the slot chosen by the Player.
      Parameters:
      card - the DevCard to add into the Slot.
      slot - the slot in which add the DevCard

    • checkSpace

      public boolean checkSpace​(DevCard card, int slot)
      Check if the DevCard it wants to add can be add in the chosen slot according to the Slot's rules.
      Parameters:
      card - the DevCard it wants to add.
      slot - the slot where it wants add the DevCard.
      Returns:
      true if the DevCard can be add in the chosen slot, false otherwise.

    • getFrontCards

      public DevCard[] getFrontCards()
      Get an array with the DevCard on the top of every slot: the only usable to produce.
      Returns:
      an Array with all the DevCard usable to produce;

    • getAllCards

      public java.util.ArrayList<DevCard> getAllCards()
      Get an ArrayList with all the DevCard in possession by the Player (even if not usable to produce).
      Returns:
      An ArrayList with all the DevCard in possession by the Player.
